Uses of Class
de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel.BaseStatus

  • Packages that use BaseStatus 
    Package Description
    de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel
    This package contains the classes relted to the Control Panel, that is, the right side panel of Siafu when a simulation is running.

    • Uses of BaseStatus in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel

      Subclasses of BaseStatus in de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AgentStatus
      The status item that displays information on an Agent.
      class  OverlayStatus
      The status item for overlays.
      class  PlaceStatus
      The status item that displays information on a Place.
